ranks.text: On 6/18 there will be an umissable event with Yusuke. Talk to him at the train station's underground passageway afterwards. Unlocks Novice Duplication, a skill that allows Yusuke to produce low-level skill cards for you.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Yusuke's turn to other Baton Pass users in battle after a 1 More.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Yusuke the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up. Unlocks the Ueno Museum location.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Artist Talk ability, giving Yusuke the chance to step in on a failed shadow negotiation. Unlocks the Inokashira Park location.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Adept Duplication skill, which allows Yusuke to create medium-level skill cards. Unlocks the Kanda Church location.

options.dialogue: "I dunno if I can do it..."

ranks.text: Requires rank 4 Proficiency. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Yusuke the chance to remove status ailments from party members when in the party.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Master Duplication ability, which allows Yusuke to create high-level skill cards.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Yusuke a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Yusuke the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Yusuke's Persona to its final form, Kamu Susano-o.
